SELECT item_type, price, image ,salt ,performance_score FROM t_product WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT item_type, price FROM t_product WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND child_id = #{childId} AND (item_type LIKE '%4g%' OR item_type LIKE '%4GB%' OR item_type LIKE '%3g%' OR item_type LIKE '%3GB%' OR item_type LIKE '%2g%' OR item_type LIKE '%2GB%') AND price BETWEEN #{minGPUBudget} AND #{maxGPUBudget}
ORDER BY price ASC, performance_score DESC
ORDER BY price DESC
LIMIT 1
